item.title: Fed governor Cook asks appeals court to reject White House bid to remove her
item.description: Cook's lawyers say the administration hasn't shown sufficient cause to fire her.

item.title: California extends cap-and-trade program to advance state climate goals
item.description: Gov. Newsom championed it as crucial facing Trump’s environmental rollbacks.

item.title: Uber sued over alleged discrimination against people with disabilities
item.description: The federal government said Friday it's suing Uber for allegedly discriminating against passengers with disabilities

item.title: FAA seeks $3.1M in fines from Boeing over safety violations, midair panel blowout
item.description: Proposed penalty is for safety violations from September 2023 to February 2024.

item.title: AI scientist says ‘learning how to learn’ will be next generation's most needed skill
item.description: Google's DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis says the most valuable human skill for the future will be “learning how to learn” as artificial intelligence tran...
